column1: Table 5: State and prison populations as a percent of capacity, 1995 and 2000-2006
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Table 5: State and prison populations as a percent of capacity, 1995 and 2000-2006

Note: Capacity excludes prisoners held in local jails and in privately operated facilities, with exceptions.  See Appendix table 5 for State-level data and States that include private facilities in capacity.
